welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Manorville, where small-town charm meets natural beauty. Explore our quaint shops and restaurants, and be sure to take in the breathtaking views of our scenic countryside."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is the main hub for all commercial flights at Suffolk County Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights at Suffolk County Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport handles all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brookhaven Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering luxurious amenities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport houses all major airlines and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves as a hub for regional airlines and offers convenient access to parking and ground transportation options.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private jet passengers and offers luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Haven Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Haven Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Hampton Airport handles all commercial flights and provides amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at East Hampton Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
